title: 20 Ping Disconnect
body: I usually play ARAM's now because I don't have time for normals and it's a quick way to gain my FWOTD, but my issue is that I'll have perfect ping in the game but sometimes throughout it my champ will randomly just stutter and then I disconnect?  My ping is usually 19-30 but when I disconnect it just ends up at 500.  When this happens I make sure to exit out of my other tabs, and this usually happens a few times every game.  My computer does NOT do this normally, and only when I play league.  It's like as if my whole entire computer disconnects from the Wi-fi, but I feel like the issue is that League is causing it.  I can play other games (e.g _Overwatch_) fine without lag or d/c, just not league.  I feel like the new patch may have contributed to this, because it didn't happen prior to updating to 7.2 today.

replies.body:
Since patches only change local files inside your League of Legends directory, they're *very unlikely* to affect your connection to our servers. What *does* usually affect your ability to reach our servers are network settings that conflict with League. I suggest configuring your local network settings using by following our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so you can ensure yours aren't conflicting.

Please let me know if this caused any change for you.
